entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with snow changing to snow near midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to periods of rain mixed with snow late in the morning and ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
